# Zent - AI-Powered Presentation Builder

Zent is an AI-powered presentation creation platform that transforms simple prompts into professional slide decks.

## Key Features
- AI-powered slide generation from text prompts
- 14+ professional slide templates
- Real-time collaborative editing
- AI assistant for content refinement
- Multiple export formats (PDF, etc.)
- Presentation mode with presenter view

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 13+ with App Router
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- OpenAI GPT-4 for content generation
- Replicate for image generation
- Supabase for data storage

## Use Cases
- Business presentations and pitch decks
- Educational content and training materials
- Marketing presentations and proposals
- Creative storytelling and visual narratives

## AI Generation Process
1. User provides a descriptive prompt
2. AI analyzes content requirements and structure
3. Intelligent template selection based on content type
4. Automatic slide generation with relevant images
5. User can edit and customize all generated content

## Template Categories
- Basic Templates: Blank card, bullets, paragraph
- Column Layouts: 2, 3, 4 columns with optional headings
- Image & Text Combinations: Various image-text arrangements
- Accent Templates: Visually prominent designs with emphasis
- Text-Focused Templates: Typography-centered layouts

## Supported Languages
- English (US)
- Spanish
- French
- German

## Content Styles
- Professional: Business-focused presentations
- Friendly: Approachable and engaging tone
- Fun: Creative and entertaining content
- Casual: Relaxed and informal approach
- Formal: Academic and structured style

## Export Options
- PDF with high-quality rendering
- Theme preservation in exports
- Multiple slide formats supported

## Accessibility Features
- Semantic HTML structure
- ARIA labels and landmarks
- Keyboard navigation support
- Screen reader compatibility
- Responsive design for all devices
